name: SevenPoems
0:
”Alexa, start Seven Poems”
”Alexa open Seven Poems”
”Alexa, Seven Poems”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seven poems
des:
Alexa reads seven poems from Text Messages, a book of contemporary poems all small enough to fit into a text message, written by Andrew Wilson.
After each poem answer "yes" to hear another poem.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
